name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Execution Incident
description: A response playbook for an incident where an attacker executed a PowerShell script to download malicious payloads and modified startup behaviors.

action--7cd92f4a-efb3-4e0d-8a4c-fa06e5a5.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--7cd92f4a-efb3-4e0d-8a4c-fa06e5a5.description: Terminate running PowerShell scripts that are suspected to be malicious.

parallel--b4c33b5e-6302-4b5f-a405-16e5ad.name: Execute follow-up actions
parallel--b4c33b5e-6302-4b5f-a405-16e5ad.description: Remove malicious startup scripts and scan for further payloads.

action--29f2e749-c4b9-4bc2-8fb0-d96b026e.name: Remove malicious scripts from startup
action--29f2e749-c4b9-4bc2-8fb0-d96b026e.description: Remove any malicious scripts added to startup to prevent persistence.

action--c3e6f800-952f-40c8-821f-f6507bd7.name: Scan for further payloads
action--c3e6f800-952f-40c8-821f-f6507bd7.description: Perform a comprehensive scan for any remaining malicious payloads on the system.

while-condition--4743f4b4-e93b-4894-95b5.name: Repeat scan until clean
while-condition--4743f4b4-e93b-4894-95b5.description: Repeat scanning until no malicious payloads are found.
